noun.definition: A small flap, label, or projection attached to something
noun.example: Pull the tab to open the can.

noun.definition: A bill or total cost, especially in a restaurant or bar
noun.example: Please put the drinks on my tab.

noun.definition: A section of a user interface that allows switching between views
noun.example: Click the tab to open a new page.

verb.definition: To label or identify with a tag
verb.example: The files were tabbed for easy reference.

verb.definition: To keep a record of costs or charges

usage_examples: He opened a new tab in the browser.
